hero.headline: Your Intimate Toolkit
hero.description: Elevate your intimate moments, whether solo, with a partner, or exploring creatively. Data stored locally, no login required, ensuring complete privacy. Unlock mystical nights with endless personalization.

banner.title: We recommend reading 'How to use' before getting started.

result.no-data: No local data available. Please import or add new content using the button above.
result.content-no-data: No data available. Please add content using the button above.

header.title: Intimate Tools
header.description: We're constantly adding new intimate tools to enrich your experience ~

card.name: Intimate Cards
card.description: Two play modes, self-selected or random, with up to 54 customizable cards!

truth-or-dare.name: Truth or Dare
truth-or-dare.description: Up to 50 customizable truths and 50 customizable dares!

roulette.name: Intimate Roulette
roulette.description: Up to 10 dice, each with 10 customizable options!

header.title: Intimate Packs
header.description: Here you can import intimate packs and fully customize their content after importing locally.

delete-confirm.title: Delete Local Data
delete-confirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete? This action cannot be undone!

step.confirm-modal-message: Are you sure you want to import the data locally?
step.confirm-modal-repeat-message: You've already imported this. Do you want to re-import?
step.alert: We won't overwrite previously imported data; instead, we'll create a new copy to prevent overwriting your previous changes!

step.step-fetch-error: Fetch failed! Click the button to report the issue.
step.step-parse-error: Parsing failed! Click the button to report the issue.
step.step-import-error: Write failed! Click the button to report the issue.

home.title: Intimate Toolkit. Customize Your Nightly Spark.
home.description: Night Mystic Intimate Toolkit, designed for couples, partners, and BDSM enthusiasts. Customize truth or dare, dice games, with privacy protection, no login required, sparking intimacy anytime!

intimacy-tool.title: Explore a Variety of Intimate Tools
